sentences.sContent: It seems like whenever I get into a really good running groove, I come down with a cold that forces me to slow down my training.
sentences.sContent_eng: It seems like whenever I get into a really good running groove, I come down with a cold that forces me to slow down my training.
sentences.sCn: 可以说，在任何时候我都可以进入到一个跑步的最佳状态，可是，我染上了一个感冒让我减低了我的训练力度。
